org.jpac.plc

Class RequestSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpac.plc.RequestSet

  • public class RequestSet
extends java.lang.Object
    represents a set of requests handled be the ReadMultipleData or WriteMultipleData

    • Constructor Summary

      RequestSet()

        public void add(Request request)
         throws TooManyRequestsException
        used to add a request to the request set
        Parameters:
        request -
        Throws:
        TooManyRequestsException - thrown, if the overall size of the request would exceed the user data space inside a pdu, if the given request would be added.
